Class InternshipApplication

Object
InternshipApplication
public class InternshipApplication extends Object
represent a student's internship application record stores links to student and internship, tracks status and acceptance state includes withdrawal request flag for staff approval workflow

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    InternshipApplication.Status
    represent possible application states pending: awaiting representative decision successful: approved by representative unsuccessful: rejected by representative withdrawn: withdrawn by student or student has accepted another offer
